snippet: The odds say we'll see two of the top three scoring offenses in the Super Bowl this year, and that could lead to a record-breaking result.
abstract: The odds say we'll see two of the top three scoring offenses in the Super Bowl this year, and that could lead to a record-breaking result.
lead_paragraph: The Packers, the Saints and the Patriots have three of the best passing offenses in N.F.L. history.

headline.main: Packers on Top in  Total Passing Value
